SELECT , ts_rank_cd(fulltext_search, query) AS ft_rank FROM gadm_region
JOIN to_tsquery(regexp_replace(quote_literal(unaccent(trim(#{query}))),'\s+',':*&','g')||':*') AS query ON query @@ fulltext_search
WHERE gadm_level = '0' ORDER BY ft_rank DESC, id

SELECT , ts_rank_cd(fulltext_search, query) AS ft_rank FROM gadm_region
JOIN to_tsquery(regexp_replace(quote_literal(unaccent(trim(#{query}))),'\s+',':*&','g')||':*') AS query ON query @@ fulltext_search
WHERE gadm_level = '1' AND parent_id[1] = UPPER(#{gid0}) ORDER BY ft_rank DESC, id

SELECT , ts_rank_cd(fulltext_search, query) AS ft_rank FROM gadm_region
JOIN to_tsquery(regexp_replace(quote_literal(unaccent(trim(#{query}))),'\s+',':*&','g')||':*') AS query ON query @@ fulltext_search
WHERE gadm_level = '2' AND parent_id[1] = UPPER(#{gid0}) AND parent_id[2] = UPPER(#{gid1}) ORDER BY ft_rank DESC, id

SELECT , ts_rank_cd(fulltext_search, query) AS ft_rank FROM gadm_region
JOIN to_tsquery(regexp_replace(quote_literal(unaccent(trim(#{query}))),'\s+',':*&','g')||':*') AS query ON query @@ fulltext_search
WHERE gadm_level = '3' AND parent_id[1] = UPPER(#{gid0}) AND parent_id[2] = UPPER(#{gid1}) AND parent_id[3] = UPPER(#{gid2}) ORDER BY ft_rank DESC, id
